mainText:
My deepest condolences to the family of Steve Jobs for a wonderful man he
was. I would like to say that he has forever changed the way we think of
technology and innovation and Apple was his creation and forever live in
memory of him. I was always impressed by the way he could stir up a crowd.
He would make us believe in fantasies again. That we can always do better. I
would like to say he is an icon my generation will never forget and one that
will live on to the next. Thank you Steve Jobs R.I.P.
author: Zachary
